data.text: @TheOnlyDJQualls Ground and root yourself before you fly. Put a blue color protection on yourself as well. I'm not entirely sure but you may be picking up on energies of what's going on in the world. Breathe. Blessings!
@TheOnlyDJQualls Wow! That is a powerful and beautiful piece of artwork.

@TheOnlyDJQualls I saw this after the 10 hours so I assume you are on land by now. I gotta tell you DJ, I cannot fly. My fear is so great that just dropping off a buddy at the airport makes me physically ill. The only places I go are places I can drive too. ✈️✈️

@TheOnlyDJQualls I have never been on an airplane because it scares me. Not the same as you though. It's just because it's been a long time and the world has been put through alot of crap. It's hard not to think of the things that could happen even if unlikely given what we have seen
@TheOnlyDJQualls Could do what Dean did when he and Sam had to take an airplane and exorcise a demon...hum Metallica or your favorite song from your favorite band.
@TheOnlyDJQualls I didn't love crowds before. Now they totally freak me out 😅😭

@TheOnlyDJQualls Keep your mask on.
You are vaccinated and boosted.
It's not your fault you are anxious. 
If more individuals weren't so damn selfish you wouldn't feel the way you do.
Take care 
Safe Travels
@TheOnlyDJQualls I have to say this is absolutely amazing 🤩 who ever did it must have really good talent cause this is breathtaking and a job well done.👍
@TheOnlyDJQualls We loved that museum so much. 💜
@Lexington_75 I hear you. Loud and clear. Same! The only other option is to not travel and that’s not an option. Sending love.
